description: This email client is slow but I don't have any other options because the other clients don't support oauth2

Keep up the good work. Thunderbird seems revitalized. It keeps getting better and better with the recent changes. Please keep improving the UI and integrate relevant/popular extensions in a meaningful way. Make the UI lean, mean and more modern.

My only criticism is the memory usage and still a bit cluttered UI, but that is to be expected because it heavily relies on Firefox web technologies. Flexibility and versatility have a price tag too.
summary: A very good, flexible and versatile cross-platform email client

description: I still find it silly to have the latest emails sit in the bottom of the list and the view of the mail under the list... Please be inspired of the Outlook client, that one is pretty much the good standard. Doesn't respect the internet hotspot being a metered network. What about syncing the email calendar to my actual calendar?
Has improved a lot after the photon make over.
The latest version is version 60.3.1, so this is very much out of date. Otherwise, Thunderbird is a classic application that performs well and reliably.

One purpose of using snaps, is to have the LATEST ands GREATEST of EVERYTHING. If you can't maintain it, get it out of your distribution, instea of fooling people. I've been waiting for an update, that never happened. Switched to Snap Store.

Everything works without any problems. The calendar theme could be less ugly though. I have seen some posts about this being EOL, but the latest Thunderbird 68.4.1 Installed with this flatpak, so no problem.
This is a great free open source project that actually works and is constantly updated with new features. Great job Mozilla, great job.
summary: The Best Free Email Client for Linux

description: Stable+Sandboxed, that is what I was looking for.
This app doesn't feel like it's maintained very good and it's very buggy and frustrating to use it.
Although Thunderbird may appear dated, the skin on this one is modern, and no one can argue with how feature complete Thunderbird is, nor how efficient on the system it is.
summary: Well packaged and extremely efficient email client

description: gooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooood
Out of all the ones paid or free I've tried, I keep coming back to Thunderbird. It's as close to Outlook Express as you can get and it flawlessly works.

very very poor why on earth did you change this once great app and make it look horrible, it used to be good but i have learning disabilities and you made my job twice as worse you can't even install add-ons which is ridiculous instead of messing with things when they work and leaving it but no, you don't even listen to your users so I'm afraid i will never ever again use this app.

the best mail client for me
clear, fast, free and runs 99.9% of the time without problems
I can literally use any other client than pay for a plugin in this package to access my Work email.
This little piece of software is just amazing. I'd use it any day over Evolution or Claw, etc.
summary: This is my go to email client

description: Is it not too much to ask that this version of Thunderbird be able to at least import from an older version of Thunderbird?
summary: Does not import from previous versions of Thunderbird

description:
Best email program. Thunderbird is like a Blues song. 

"Baby I'm leaving you. 
But now I'm back!"
Very happy with Thunderbird flatpak. Best yet.
Great for professional environment at free of cost.

I love love LOVE Thunderbird. It's the best email client for being FOSS. Other ones may look pretty but none work as well and have as much to offer as Thunderbird. I care about my privacy and Thunderbird lets me email on my terms. Love it!
It just works (and even has dark mode all around, just like Outlook, with the benefit of knowing how to quote things).
summary: Great client, specially when paired with owl, for Exchange users

description: Most stable and complete email client!
This app is free and it works perfectly
It works great on Fedora. It looks better with the new updates.
Ебитесь в рот, разрабы
After upgrade it started complaining about all the certificates that the previous version had been happy with.  Worse, it wouldn't let me exception them. Kinda dead to me right now.
summary: Has been solid in the past, but ..

description: It works well enough on Silverblue. But the UI is hideous, stuck in 1999. Thunderbird needs to be re-designed from the ground up to look more like a modern email client. Geary, BlueMail and even macOS Mail could provide hints for the UI/UX designers. But it is free, and it works.
I always use it
One of the best e-mail clients out there
Great for archiving email and easy to import with export addon.

I've tried many email clients but none quite match TB.

~ TD

As the titles says, works great with Office365.
Mail and calender integration works without issue.
It's definitely improved a LOT over the past year. if you were driven away by bugs or were using another mail application but miss the extensibility of thunderbird. Give it another try
summary: Not perfect, but It's gotten a lot better

description: Just works tm.
The latest version is 102 and they're still serving version 91.
summary: I like Thunderbird, but this version from Flathub is way out-of-date!

description: Definitely works but the UI is seriously outdated. I am all for the nostalgic look but why can't the Mozilla team make this more modern looking like Google Gmail or something? I know the most important part of any app is that it 1. works and 2. it is stable but come on guys (Mozilla developers) you've had many years to tweak this app to make it look modern and not something you would see from the AOL days of You've Got Mail.
summary: Works and Stable - Outdated User Interface

description: Great if you dig the ultra-functional design (although updated UI is coming). Haven't seen anything with better junk protectio and search. Works perfectly on Fedora 36 (and have been for the years I've used it.)
Not sure why, but this package is VERY out of date! 103 is out and this is stuck on 91...
If only I could get it to open in Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS. It worked for a time then it stopped working, now I cannot get it to launch. Flathub package for Ubuntu.
summary: Great app! but, until I get it working like before only 4 stars

description: Wer wirklich an einem PC "arbeiten" möchte und einen guten, verlässlichen Email Client braucht, für den stellt Thunderbird eine tolle Alternative zu Evolution dar.

Tried all kinds of programs, but just super happy with Thunderbird. Integrated S/MIME and PGP support, integrated calendar, cross-platform, support for themes and different storage engines, all kinds of plugins e.g. google calendar sync. This is simply an amazing piece of software!

Hab mir mal die kommende Version 91 angesehen... Furchtbar, die Änderungen sind marginal. Sofort wieder entfernt. Leider hat sich an der verstaubten Gui wieder nichts geändert... wenn dann nur Kleinigkeiten. In Linux ein Jammer, es findet sich kein brauchbarer, moderner E-Mail Client. Thunderbird, altbacken - einfach nur häßlich. Kmail? Katastrophe, diesen Mist einzurichten... Nach Stunden aufgegeben. Evolution Mail: Seit Monaten kein Ausdruck mehr möglich. Nichts passiert, dass dieser Missstand endlich abgestellt wird. Einziger Lichtblick: Geary.

Thunderbird kann meiner Meinung nach alles was ein Email-Client können sollte, funktioniert bie mir mit 5 Email-Konten bestens und ist technologisch (Verschlüsselung, Kalender, CardDAV, CalDAV etc.) bestens gerüstet. Falls ein Feature fehlt bietet ev. eine Extension das passende an.
Gut, das User Interface ist nicht das modernste, aber wie man Thunderbird nur 1/5 Sternen geben kann ist mir nicht verständlich.
summary: Für mich (immer noch) der Desktop-Email-Client der Wahl

description: Grundsätzlich funktioniert alles. Und das man alles neu einrichten muss ist ok, gibt es bei anderen Programmen auch. Aber dass ich mich bei speziellen Konten trotz korrekter Einstellung nicht anmelden kann, weil ich weder das Zertifikat runterladen kann noch eine dauerhafte Sicherheitsausnahme speichern kann, muss dringend behoben werden. Was nützt ein E-Mail-Programm mit dem ich keine E-Mails abrufen kann. Standard-Accounts wie GMX & Co. funktionieren einwandfrei. Insoweit sind 3 Sterne gerechtfertigt.
Es muy practica pero la falta de idioma castellano hace menos productiva.
summary: Una aplicacion muy buena, pero le falta el idioma castellano

description: Buenisima, muy util para enviar correos con html por Gmail
Como siempre, el mejor cliente de correo. Fiel compañero de trabajo desde hace muchos años, completo, seguro y eficiente.
Simplemente funciona perfectamente 10/10
Una vez que te acostumbras es sencilla, intuitiva, muy completa y hace lo que necesitas. 100% Recomendada
parfait, fontionne bien
impossible de le mettre en français
Mieux qu'outlook.
С последним обновлением вообще стало отлично - обновились многие плагины, можно расширять функционал.
Уберите этот снап пакет он не оригинальный !
После перехода на flatpack лгает очень сильно, даже всего с двумя ящиками.

和Windows下一样非常好用
但是: 在程序打开时,Dock栏图标,点邮件,偶尔(已出现两次)会出现鼠标无相应,整个显示屏无相应,只能强制重启,暂时不知道是什么原因.
Fedora32 Workstation
ThunderBird为最新版
GNOME安装了Dash to Dock插件
summary: 在某些情况下,会导致GNOME界面无相应,只能强制关机
